this_title: I want to make a movie
introduction: Gilitte Leung 梁碧芝的短片作品. 穫得王家衛的特別關注獎!一個女孩知道了一個短片比賽後告訴給她的一個朋友, 朋友覺得很好玩心底裡也想拍但沒有...因為她認為她沒可能拍...但因為比賽評審主席是王家衛導演..是她很喜歡的導演...如是她便展開了她的journey, 做一件一直只敢想而不會去實行的事.A journey makes you change during the starting period to the end. It makes you being true to yourself. A girl is influenced by this competition who starts her own journey. The change from this journey leads her to do something she never did before."I see things through my brain, not my sight."Crew: Directed and written by Gilitte P.C. LeungCinematographer: Gilitte P.C. LeungActress: Charmine Choi and Joyce LamOriginal Music: Gilitte P.C. LeungEdited by Gilitte P.C. Leung and Charmine ChoiGilitteLeungShatin IVE
chinese_title: I want to make a movie
